metadata.synopsis: Dialog with Yannis, one of the priestess of Ilmater. It seems that with father Lorgan dead she took some of his responsibilities.This dialog is available after you participated in a threeway dialog with her and father Lorgan.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_AClick on |Yannis| - S_WYR_OpenHand_Yannis - cb5ad2e6-40e9-4377-9669-1c4e4b1106e0 - (-45 45 -6)This will trigger a threeway dialog between Yannis, Valerio and the player. Afterwards Valerior leaves and you can click on Yannis again to get this dialog.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Tell Yannis what you've found so far.

87.speaker: Sister Yannis
87.text: So there were assassins under the temple working with the real killer? If only we could prove that to Valeria...

55.speaker: Sister Yannis
55.text: Assassins under this temple is certainly unnerving news, thank you for taking care of them.

47.speaker: Sister Yannis
47.text: Talking to the victims' corpses was clever, but I don't know if Valeria will accept that testimony.

62.speaker: Sister Yannis
62.text: The real killer's name was Dolor? Shame we have no hard proof of that.

37.speaker: Sister Yannis
37.text: I suppose it's not a surprise that this temple has tunnels underneath - Rivington's chock full of them.

40.speaker: Sister Yannis
40.text: You're on the right track. Please, keep looking.

86.speaker: Sister Yannis
86.text: Gods... That's worrying. I knew this went deeper than Brilgor and Lorgan.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Here's the murder weapon - it was in some secret tunnels under the temple.

6.speaker: Sister Yannis
6.text: That's it! Proof that Valeria missed something. They'll have to listen to you now.

91.speaker: Sister Yannis
91.text: If you can convince them of Brilgor's innocence then... Perhaps Ilmater could shed one less tear this day.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Father Lorgan is on this list of murder targets I found. Looks like more killings are planned.

17.speaker: Sister Yannis
17.text: By His holy tears... That's - that's terrifying.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: I'm still looking - any advice on where to begin?

33.speaker: Sister Yannis
33.text: The killing happened in the kitchen cellar. Could be a good place to start.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: What do I need to prove Brilgor's innocence?

89.speaker: Sister Yannis
89.text: Valeria never found the murder weapon - that would be definitive proof that they missed something.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: I need to know where the bodies are.

11.speaker: Sister Yannis
11.text: The temple's not open for public worship right now, sorry. Not until we replace Father Lorgan.
11.context: NodeContext: pause before "passing" - it should be painful for her to say

69.speaker: Player
69.text: I'm here about Lorgan. I want to solve his murder.

43.speaker: Sister Yannis
43.text: You're too late, I'm afraid. The Investigator has been and gone.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: What do you usually worship here?

20.speaker: Sister Yannis
20.text: You must be new here - quite the time to be passing through.

9.speaker: Sister Yannis
9.text: Here, we give thanks to Ilmater. Well, we did, until our high priest... Until he...
9.context: NodeContext: she can't quite get the words out

78.speaker: Sister Yannis
78.text: One of the refugees - a tiefling called Brilgor - killed Father Lorgan. Allegedly. Doesn't add up to me.
78.context: NodeContext: she struggles through this, recounting it is very raw still

57.speaker: Player
57.text: You're in luck. A Bhaalist serial killer in the Lower City claimed he murdered Lorgan - not this refugee.

38.speaker: Sister Yannis
38.text: Bhaal's got a bloody history with this city. How exactly does this news make me lucky?

46.speaker: Player
46.text: I scattered his brains across the Lower City cobbles, that's how.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Knowledge is power. Also, he's dead.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: He only killed one of your priests, not the entire temple.

28.speaker: Sister Yannis
28.text: If there are Bhaalists on the loose, Investigator Valeria will want to know. They're at Sharess' Caress right now.

19.speaker: Sister Yannis
19.text: Investigator Valeria. Used to be on the ball, but this time... I'm unsure.

3.speaker: Sister Yannis
3.text: Thank you. It just - it doesn't make sense.

1.speaker: Sister Yannis
1.text: He risked everything for those refugees. Doesn't make sense for one of them to kill him.

39.speaker: Sister Yannis
39.text: Besides, Brilgor wouldn't know which end to hold the dagger. He's no killer.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Lorgan's murderer was a Bhaalist serial killer. I stopped him.

67.speaker: Sister Yannis
67.text: Ilmater grants us small mercies on occasion.

21.speaker: Sister Yannis
21.text: Report this to Investigator Valeria in Sharess' Caress. It's only right they know.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: So what do you think really happened?

23.speaker: Sister Yannis
23.text: Wish I knew. Not that my opinion matters.

14.speaker: Sister Yannis
14.text: Have a look around. If you find something that'll change their mind, they'll be at Sharess' Caress.

2.speaker: Sister Yannis
2.text: Lorgan's in the room behind us, with Sister Rose. Brilgor's buried out back, through the kitchen and the dormitories.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Can you tell me where Lorgan was killed?

44.speaker: Sister Yannis
44.text: In the cellar. You can get down there through Brother Donnick's kitchen. Good luck.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Perhaps I could investigate - make sure nothing was missed?

51.speaker: Sister Yannis
51.text: You can try. Maybe the Investigator will listen to you.

18.speaker: Sister Yannis
18.text: Thank you. Now Brilgor's name has been cleared, we can extend our help to the refugees once more.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I need to speak with an initiate of yours - Shirra Clarwen - where is she?

66.speaker: Sister Yannis
66.text: Shirra? I can tell you where to find her, but you might find the conversation rather one-sided.

61.speaker: Sister Yannis
61.text: She's buried in the temple crypt. Passed only last year, poor thing.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: I want to help you clear Brilgor's name.

49.speaker: Sister Yannis
49.text: Thank you - Ilmater smiles upon us this day. Feel free to look around the temple.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: No, sorry, I'll leave you be.

50.speaker: Sister Yannis
50.text: Please, go talk to the Investigator. The sooner we clear Brilgor's name, the better.
